pullRequest.title: Make "Force Browse" search for files without slash at the end of the path

commit.message:
Make Force Browse search for files without slash at the end of the path and without extension, closes #5883

Signed-off-by: Diogo Silva <diogo.m.r.silva@tecnico.ulisboa.pt>

nodes.bodyText: The extensions might be an unmodifiable collection (when Force Browse files is enabled and no extension is provided).
Worth extracting a variable for the row to avoid changing all of them in following changes.
I'd remove the and without slash..., being a file already implies not having a slash.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -13,6 +13,7 @@ bruteforce.dir.and.children.popup   = Forced Browse Directory (and Children)
 bruteforce.options.button.addfile	= Select File...
 bruteforce.options.error.failCaseString.invalid = The Fail Case String should not be empty.
 bruteforce.options.label.addfile	= Add custom Forced Browse file:
+bruteforce.options.label.browsefileswithoutextension = Force Browse files without extension and without slash at the end

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -5,6 +5,9 @@ The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/).
 
 ## Unreleased
 
+## [10] - 2020-03-04
+### Added
+- option and functionality to find files without extension

nodes.bodyText: If selected then in addition to brute forcing directories, files without extension will also be brute forced.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -26,6 +26,12 @@

Add custom Forced Browse file


These should be text files with one file or directory name per line.
Files are added to the 'dirbuster' directory underneath the ZAP home directory. +

Force Browse files without extension

+ If checked then in addition to brute forcing directories, the files without extension will also be brute forced.
